animals.name: Zebra
animals.description: The lion is a species in the family Felidae and a member of the genus Panthera.

animals.name: Mouse
animals.description: Elephants are large mammals of the family Elephantidae and the order Proboscidea.

animals.name: Lizard
animals.description: Zebras are African equids with distinctive black-and-white striped coats.

animals.name: Dog
animals.description: Mouse are medium-sized, long-tailed rodents belonging to the genus Rattus.

animals.name: Elephant
animals.description: The domestic dog is a domesticated descendant of the wolf.

animals.name: Lion
animals.description: The tiger is the largest living cat species and a member of the genus Panthera.

transport.name: Car
transport.description: A car is a wheeled motor vehicle used for transportation.

transport.name: Train
transport.description: A train is a series of connected vehicles that run on railways to transport goods or passengers.

transport.name: Motorcycle
transport.description: A motorcycle is a two-wheeled motor vehicle that is powered by an engine.

transport.name: Van
transport.description: A van is a type of vehicle used for transporting goods or passengers, often with a larger cargo area.

transport.name: Ambulance
transport.description: An ambulance is a vehicle equipped to transport sick or injured people to medical facilities.

transport.name: Helicopter
transport.description: A helicopter is a type of aircraft that derives lift from rotating blades and is used for various purposes.

clothing.name: Cap
clothing.description: A cap is a type of headwear with a visor, often worn for casual or sports purposes.

clothing.name: Socks
clothing.description: Socks are garments worn on the feet, usually under shoes.

clothing.name: Shoes
clothing.description: A shoe is a type of footwear worn to protect and comfort the foot.

clothing.name: Underpants
clothing.description: Underpants are garments worn on the lower body, covering only part of the thigh.

clothing.name: Jacket
clothing.description: A jacket is a mid-length garment for the upper body.

clothing.name: Sweater
clothing.description: Sweater includes garments like sweatshirts and sweatpants, typically made from soft, comfortable fabric.

food.name: Tacos
food.description: Tacos are a traditional Mexican dish consisting of a folded or rolled tortilla filled with various ingredients like meat, beans, and vegetables.

food.name: Salad
food.description: Salad is a dish consisting of a mixture of various ingredients such as vegetables, fruits, nuts, and dressings, often served cold.

food.name: Noodles
food.description: Noodles are a type of staple food made from unleavened dough, often boiled or stir-fried, and can be served in a variety of dishes.

food.name: Burger
food.description: A hamburger is a sandwich consisting of a cooked patty of ground meat, usually beef, placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun.

food.name: Pizza
food.description: Pizza is an Italian dish consisting of a usually round, flat base of leavened wheat-based dough topped with tomatoes, cheese, and often various other ingredients.

food.name: Sushi
food.description: Sushi is a Japanese dish consisting of vinegared rice accompanied by various ingredients, such as seafood, vegetables, and sometimes tropical fruits.

treats.name: Chocolate
treats.description: Chocolate is a sweet, brown food made from roasted and ground cacao seeds.

treats.name: Candy
treats.description: Candy is a sweet treat made with sugar or other sweeteners.

treats.name: Cookies
treats.description: Cookies are small, sweet, baked treats often containing ingredients like chocolate chips, nuts, or dried fruit.

treats.name: Waffle
treats.description: Waffle is a light, crisp, batter-based cake cooked between two patterned plates.

treats.name: Cake
treats.description: Cake is a sweet baked dessert, usually made with flour, sugar, eggs, and butter.

treats.name: Ice Cream
treats.description: Ice cream is a frozen dessert made from dairy products and often flavored with fruits or other ingredients.

fun-things.name: Puzzle
fun-things.description: A puzzle is a game, toy, or problem designed to test ingenuity or knowledge.

fun-things.name: Board Game
fun-things.description: A board game is a game that involves counters or pieces moved or placed on a pre-marked surface according to a set of rules.

fun-things.name: Kite
fun-things.description: A kite is a tethered flying object with a light frame and thin material, flown for recreation or sport.

fun-things.name: Ball
fun-things.description: A ball is a spherical object used in various games and sports.

fun-things.name: Color
fun-things.description: Color refers to the characteristic of visual perception described through color names such as red, blue, green, etc.

fun-things.name: Pencil
fun-things.description: A pencil is a writing instrument made of a thin stick of graphite encased in wood.

vegetables.name: Carrot
vegetables.description: The carrot is a root vegetable often claimed to be the perfect health food.

vegetables.name: Broccoli
vegetables.description: Broccoli is an edible green plant in the cabbage family.

vegetables.name: Spinach
vegetables.description: Spinach is a leafy green flowering plant native to central and Western Asia.

vegetables.name: Tomato
vegetables.description: The tomato is an edible red fruit commonly used as a vegetable in cooking.

vegetables.name: Cucumber
vegetables.description: Cucumber is a widely cultivated creeping vine plant that bears cylindrical fruits used as culinary vegetables.

vegetables.name: Pepper
vegetables.description: Peppers are fruits of plants in the Capsicum genus, commonly referred to as vegetables in culinary contexts.

fruits.name: Apple
fruits.description: An apple is an edible fruit produced by an apple tree.

fruits.name: Banana
fruits.description: A banana is an elongated, edible fruit produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants.

fruits.name: Orange
fruits.description: An orange is a type of citrus fruit that is commonly eaten as food.

fruits.name: Strawberry
fruits.description: A strawberry is a bright red, juicy, and sweet fruit with seeds on the outside.

fruits.name: Grapes
fruits.description: Grapes are small, round fruits that grow in bunches and can be eaten fresh or used to make wine.

fruits.name: Pineapple
fruits.description: A pineapple is a tropical fruit with a tough, spiky exterior and sweet, yellow flesh inside.

toys.name: Doll
toys.description: A doll is a model of a human figure, typically of a baby or girl, used as a child's toy.

toys.name: Action Figure
toys.description: An action figure is a doll or toy that represents a character from film, comic books, or other media.

toys.name: Building Blocks
toys.description: Building blocks are toy components that can be assembled to build various structures.

toys.name: Toy Car
toys.description: A toy car is a small model vehicle, typically for children to play with.

toys.name: Stuffed Animal
toys.description: A stuffed animal is a soft toy in the shape of an animal, often used for cuddling.

toys.name: Toy Robot
toys.description: A toy robot is a mechanical or electronic toy that mimics a robot's appearance or actions.

home.name: Lamp
home.description: A lamp is a device for giving light.

home.name: Sofa
home.description: A sofa is a long upholstered seat with a back and arms, for two or more people.

home.name: Table
home.description: A table is an item of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs.

home.name: Chair
home.description: A chair is a piece of furniture for one person to sit on, typically having a back and four legs.

home.name: Bed
home.description: A bed is a piece of furniture used for sleeping or resting.

home.name: Curtains
home.description: Curtains are pieces of cloth that are hung to cover windows.

tools.name: Hammer
tools.description: A hammer is a tool consisting of a heavy 'head' fixed to a long handle, used for jobs such as breaking things or driving in nails.

tools.name: Screwdriver
tools.description: A screwdriver is a tool used to turn screws.

tools.name: Wrench
tools.description: A wrench is a tool used for gripping and turning objects.

tools.name: Pliers
tools.description: Pliers are a hand tool used to hold objects firmly, bend, or compress.

tools.name: Saw
tools.description: A saw is a tool consisting of a tough blade or wire used to cut through material, most often wood.

tools.name: Tape Measure
tools.description: A tape measure is a flexible ruler used to measure size or distance.

fun-activities.name: Painting
fun-activities.description: Painting is a fun activity that allows you to express creativity through colors and strokes.

fun-activities.name: Cycling
fun-activities.description: Cycling is an outdoor activity that strengthens the body and helps explore nature.

fun-activities.name: Reading
fun-activities.description: Reading is a calming activity that stimulates the mind with stories and knowledge.

fun-activities.name: Gardening
fun-activities.description: Gardening is a relaxing activity that involves growing and nurturing plants.

fun-activities.name: Cooking
fun-activities.description: Cooking is a rewarding activity that involves preparing meals and experimenting with recipes.

fun-activities.name: Photography
fun-activities.description: Photography is an artistic activity that captures moments and scenes through a camera lens.
